content.body: i also have hands to put together for that topic

sorry for the basic question, but can someone remind me if the plan is for module declarations / expressions to evaluate to ModuleSource objects or to some other kind of thing?

also is "the plan" written down somewhere? I know there's https://github.com/tc39/proposal-compartments/blob/master/0-module-and-module-source.md but it's quite old and I don't know if it's current
